greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Riordan array ((1+2x^2)/(1-x^3),x).
comment: Row sums are A117571. Diagonal sums are A117572. Inverse is A116949.
formula: Number triangle T(n,k)=2*J(L((n-k+2)/3))[k<=n] where L(j/p) is the Legendre symbol of j and p and J(n)=A001045(n)
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Mar 29 2006
